scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run validate
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t recharge-storefront-api-mcp:$(npm run version --silent) . && docker tag recharge-storefront-api-mcp:$(npm run version --silent) recharge-storefront-api-mcp:latest
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test:api-keys
scripts.lint: find src scripts -name '*.js' -exec node --check {} \; && echo '✅ Lint check passed'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && node -c src/server.js && echo "✅ Syntax validation passed" && npm run coverage
scripts.health: node -e "console.log('✅ Server health check passed'); console.log('📊 Node.js version:', process.version); console.log('🖥️  Platform:', process.platform);"
scripts.stats: node -e "import('./src/tools/index.js').then(m => { console.log('📊 Project Statistics:'); console.log('🔧 Total tools:', m.tools.length); console.log('📁 Tool files:', require('fs').readdirSync('./src/tools').filter(f => f.endsWith('-tools.js')).length); console.log('📦 Dependencies:', Object.keys(require('./package.json').dependencies).length); console.log('🛠️  Dev dependencies:', Object.keys(require('./package.json').devDependencies || {}).length); console.log('📋 Scripts:', Object.keys(require('./package.json').scripts).length); }).catch(e => console.error('Error:', e.message));"
